events.name: ADMETA
events.subTheme: The Echo Chamber Effect / Performative vs. Powerful
events.oneLiner: Clash, convince, and command the crowd in our most intense debating arena yet.
events.longDesc: In the vast expanse of ideas, walk into the arena of intellect where minds collide like thunder. Admeta beckons, a crucible for discourse where argument's fire purifies perspectives. It is a platform that enables debaters and newcomers to put their knowledge to the test, a place where diversified opinions come together, and every word is meaningful. If you possess a knack for this craft, Admeta welcomes you to join our passionate debates and community of thinkers. Join us on our quest for knowledge and truth informed by reason, a place for sharing ideas and thoughts!

events.name: EXPLORARE
events.subTheme: Offline is the New Luxury / Digital Humanity
events.oneLiner: Hunt through digital clues and real-world trails in a race that tests both brain and presence.
events.longDesc:
Embark on an extraordinary and unforgettable adventure with Explorare- a one of a kind scavenger hunt experience that promises thrills, mystery, and discovery at every turn! 

 An opportunity to navigate through mind boggling clues, solve riddles, and go aboard on an exciting journey of discovery. A real-life mission awaits those brave enough to accept the challenge. Don't miss out on the quest of a lifetime‚Äîit's time to uncover hidden treasures and finally embark on the treasure hunt we‚Äôve all dreamed of!

events.name: FORTUNA
events.oneLiner: Invest, manipulate, and rise‚Äîor crash‚Äîin this live-action economic rollercoaster.
events.longDesc:
Have you ever wondered what drives the fluctuation of stock prices? How do investors make decisions in the ever-changing landscape of the stock market?

If yes, then this challenge is for you. With market dynamics at your fingertips, unleash your inner investor and use your analytic skills to make investment decisions. Tune in to find out who will emerge as the Wolf of our simulated Wall Street.

events.name: ARTEM
events.shortDesc: The Digital x Physical Art Lab
events.oneLiner: Blur the lines between digital illusions and tangible truths through artistic alchemy.
events.longDesc:
Introducing ARTEM, an event that demonstrates your perception of colour theory and aesthetic prowess. As you explore the evocative colours on your palette, your brushstrokes will weave an ingenious reminiscence of a legendary painting at the convergence of art and brilliance.

Let your emotions unfurl on a canvas and reconstruct a classic masterpiece ricocheting off the deepest corner of art history.

events.name: CARMEN
events.subTheme: Performative vs. Powerful / Digital Safe Spaces
events.oneLiner: Let your words burn, heal, and roar in a raw, unplugged slam showdown.
events.longDesc:
Gather your poets, voices diverse,
the song of Inclusion, our universe.
Carmen calls, with open arms,
Embracing all tales, in countless forms.

From every heart, let verses blossom,
In this contest, let unity consume.
Let every voice, in unison,
Paint a canvas of inclusion.

With ink and quill, let's weave our tales,
An inclusive spirit always prevails.
Let Carmen's stage be brightly lit,
For every soul to find its fit.

If poetry's your craft, then heed the call,
Carmen awaits, inviting one and all.
Inclusivity's theme, a canvas wide,
Where every voice finds its stride.

events.name: E-SPORTS
events.subTheme: Ghosts in the Machine / Digital Humanity
events.oneLiner: Enter the arena where gaming isn‚Äôt just play‚Äîit‚Äôs philosophy, ethics, and adrenaline.
events.longDesc:
Prepare to dive into the digital battlefield as Perseverantia gears up for an epic E-Sports event like never before!

This event promises thrills, spills, and intense competition that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The stage is set for a thrilling showdown, where students will battle it out in a variety of video games, showcasing their skills and strategic prowess.

So, what are you waiting for? Gear up, gamers! If you excel in strategic thinking, communication, and staying calm under pressure, this event is just your cup of tea. The countdown to our showdown has begun, and it‚Äôs shaping up to be an event you wouldn't want to miss!

events.name: FABULA
events.subTheme: The Aesthetic of ‚ÄòReal‚Äô / Validation Nation / Ctrl+Me
events.oneLiner: Craft a world in minutes‚Äîtell bold stories that question what‚Äôs real and what‚Äôs liked.
events.longDesc:
‚ÄòThe best education in film is to make one‚Äô
‚Äì Stanley Kubrick

This stem-winding film-making event beckons the collaboration of visionary leadership, theatrical genius, and masterly cinematography to create a spellbinding masterpiece. Whether you have a flair for delivering the tragic, the comic, the suspenseful, or the dramatic, you are invited to unravel the skeins of thematic thought and entwine the details of dramatic effect into a monumental masterpiece.

Let your emotions and thoughts shine on the screen as the film unfolds, stirring hearts and spirits alike.

events.name: GRATIA
events.subTheme: Dance Therapy / Hashtag to Heartbeat / Filtered Feelings / Lag & Real-Time
events.oneLiner: Move beyond choreography‚Äîdance your message, your trauma, your truth.
events.longDesc:
Do you find it difficult to restrain yourself from shaking a leg when you hear music?

If yes, then gear up to immerse yourself in a symphony of movement and express yourself with 'Gratia', a platform where dancing is a celebration and amalgamation of rhythm and expression. 

This is not just another event; it is a chance to allow  your creativity to go berserk and leave the audience awestruck with moves that range from the thrilling pops of hip-hop to the deft footwork of Indian classical dance.

So get ready to set the stage on fire and dance like nobody's watching!

events.name: MR. & MS. PERSEVERANTIA
events.oneLiner: Showcase your truest self in a pageant where substance outshines spectacle.
events.longDesc:
Are you ready to enter a world where beauty, brains, and brilliance all come together from the moment the curtains rise? If your talents lie in dancing, singing, or even out-of-the-box thinking, you‚Äôve got just the skillset for Mr. and Mrs. Perseverantia. Each of the rounds will give you a special opportunity to showcase your creativity and on-the-spot thinking.


Step into the spotlight, let your charisma shine, and steal the show with your vibrant personality!

events.name: PANACHE
events.subTheme: Validation Nation / Offline is the New Luxury
events.oneLiner: Stitch rebellion into style as you design fashion with purpose, protest, and personality.
events.longDesc:
"Fashion is about dreaming and making other people dream."
-Donatella Versace

Get ready to turn the page on fashion. Join us for a show where the typical boundaries of glamour and style are transcended and the unfiltered essence of who we truly are is celebrated.

Panache is a one-of-a-kind competition where we call upon all fashionistas to leave us spellbound by their creativity. If you find yourself immersed in the field of fashion then this is your chance to soar higher. Come join us as we celebrate fashion and style in a way never seen before.

events.name: SOCIALE
events.oneLiner: A candid collection of reflections and revelations on our lives behind the screen.
events.longDesc:
Do you have the constant urge to voice your opinion on global matters? Do you think that social media is your forte? If yes, then Sociale is the ideal event for you! Here is your opportunity to sharpen your skills while spreading a powerful message.

This exciting event places a strong emphasis on creating an impact through social media, allowing you to unleash your social media prowess and creativity.

Come spread YOUR message and make a change through this enthralling competition!

events.name: THE CODING ARENA
events.oneLiner: Build tech that asks not just can we‚Äîbut should we?

events.name: MASTERCHEF
events.subTheme: Offline is the New Luxury / Digital Humanity
events.oneLiner: Cook offline, think online‚Äîcraft dishes that blend tradition, tech, and taste.

events.name: MONOPOLIUM
events.oneLiner: Play the ultimate, multi-day Monopoly showdown where strategy meets survival.

events.name: THINKING INSIDE THE BOX
events.oneLiner: Speak your truth without the obvious‚Äîdescribe the indescribable under pressure.
events.longDesc: Message: True expression isn‚Äôt limited by language‚Äîit‚Äôs expanded by it.

events.name: Basketball
events.oneLiner: Dribble, defend, and dominate the court‚Äîone slam at a time.
events.longDesc:
‚ÄúNever say never, because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.‚Äù 
-Michael Jordan

Whether you are a seasoned basketeer or a newcomer or if you consideryourself as a fan of the NBA or a basketball freak , this event is the perfect chance for you to prove yourself as a true basketball player. Be prepared to take your perfect shot while enjoying the thrill of the game.

events.name: Football
events.oneLiner: Strategy meets stamina in this ultimate face-off on the field.
events.longDesc:
‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre not playing with passion, then you‚Äôre not playing football.‚Äù 
-Thierry Henry

Football is not an ordinary sporting event as it involves a twist of strategy and mind, leading to some engrossing and exciting matches. If you think you have that indomitable spirit and unwavering determination this event is the perfect chance for you to showcase your skills.

events.name: Gully Cricket
events.oneLiner: Nostalgia and cricket collide‚Äîno stadium, just pure street-style glory.

events.name: Table Tennis
events.oneLiner: Fast hands, sharp reflexes‚Äîlet the tables turn!

events.name: Tug of War
events.shortDesc: Band Where rhythm meets rebellion‚Äîonly the rawest sound survives.
events.oneLiner: Team up, hold tight, and pull your way to glory in this ultimate test of grit.
events.longDesc:
Did you ever feel you were unable to showcase it or had it lost among countless other thoughts? If so, get your gears turning.

This event is your perfect chance to show your contenders the triumph of team spirit. If you have the coordination, strategic mind, and strength, tug of war is the perfect event for you. This is the tug-of-war of extravaganza, strength, and will. Let the tug of war begin!

about.tb1: Bombay Scottish School, Mahim has returned with the third edition of its Annual Inter-School Fest - Perseverantia!
about.tbg: Our theme for this year is INCLUSIVITY
about.tb2:
Whether you are a Gaming Geek or a Football Freak, a Fashionista or a Filmmaker, a Dancer or a Debater, a Writer or the Wolf of Wall Street, we have something for everyone.
Join us on an enthralling journey where you can make a mark by displaying your talent through 15 exciting events.

register.content: Be part of Perseverantia '25 and showcase your talents across 21+ thrilling events. Don‚Äôt miss your chance to compete, collaborate, and celebrate!
